subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Austin Boucher threw a touchdown pass to Armand Robinson with 33 seconds left and Miami (Ohio) won the Mid-American Conference championship with a 26-21 victory over No. 24 Northern Illinois in Detroit.
snippet: Austin Boucher threw a touchdown pass to Armand Robinson with 33 seconds left and Miami (Ohio) won the Mid-American Conference championship with a 26-21 victory over No. 24 Northern Illinois in Detroit.
